edu.cwru.sepia.agent

Class ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.agent.ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch
  • Enclosing class:
    ThreadIntermediary

    public static class ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple structure allowing the return of the current state/history and a latch that indicates when the next state will be ready.
    Author:
    The Condor

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch

        public ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch(State.StateView stateView,
                                   History.HistoryView historyView,
                                   ThreadIntermediary.StateType stateType,
                                   java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch nextStateLatch)
        Build a structure with a view and a latch.
        Parameters:
        stateView - The current state.
        historyView - The current history.
        stateType - INITIAL if this is the first state of an episode, TERMINAL if it is the last, MIDDLE otherwise
        nextStateLatch - A latch for the next state.
